title: Anime Screening
description: Enjoy screenings of the latest and classic anime episodes on the big screen.

title: Cosplay Contest
description: Show off your amazing anime-themed costumes and win prizes.

title: Artist Alley
description: Browse and purchase artwork and merchandise from talented anime artists.

title: Panel Discussions
description: Engage with industry professionals and fellow fans in insightful discussions.

title: Manga Swap
description: Trade your manga collection with other enthusiasts and discover new titles.

title: Virtual Reality Anime Experience
description: Immerse yourself in the world of anime through a thrilling VR experience.
